resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104558</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104558</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206859</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Managing Archeological Collections</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handhabende Archäologische Ansammlungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collections Archéologiques de Gestion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleções Archeological Controlando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collezioni Archeological Di Gestione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχείριση των συλλογών Archeological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colecciones Arqueológicas De Manejo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online technical assistance and distance learning effort covering all aspects of curation -- caring for archaeological collections such as objects, records, reports, and digital data -- wherever they may be (in the field, the archeologist's office, the lab, or a repository).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine technische Unterstützung und Abstand 
Lernenonlinebemühung, die alle Aspekte von curation umfaßt -- 
interessierend für archäologische Ansammlungen wie Nachrichten, 
Sätze, Reports und digitale Daten -- wohin sie sein können (in 
auffangene, im Büro des Archäologen, im Labor oder in einem 
Behälter).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un effort en ligne d'assistance technique et 
d'étude de distance couvrant tous les aspects de curation -- 
entretenant les collections archéologiques telles que des objets, des
enregistrements, des états, et des données digitales -- partout où 
ils peuvent être (dans la zone, le bureau de l'archéologue, le 
laboratoire, ou un dépôt).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um esforço em linha do auxílio técnico e da 
aprendizagem de distância que cobre todos os aspectos do curation -- 
se importando com coleções archaeological tais como objetos, 
registros, relatórios, e dados digitais -- onde quer que podem ser 
(no campo, no escritório do arqueólogo, no laboratório, ou em um 
repositório).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno sforzo in linea imparare di distanza e di 
assistenza tecnica che riguarda tutte le funzioni del curation -- 
preoccupandosi per le collezioni archaeological quali gli oggetti, i 
record, i rapporti ed i dati digitali -- dovunque possano essere (nel 
campo, nell'ufficio dell'archeologo, nel laboratorio, o in un 
deposito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση τεχνική προσπάθεια βοήθειας 
και από απόσταση εκμάθησης που καλύπτει όλες τις πτυχές του 
curation -- που φροντίζει για τις αρχαιολογικές συλλογές όπως 
τα αντικείμενα, αρχεία, εκθέσεις, και ψηφιακά στοιχεία -- 
οπουδήποτε μπορούν να είναι (στο πεδίο, το γραφείο του 
αρχαιολόγου, το εργαστήριο, ή μια αποθήκη).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un esfuerzo en línea de la asistencia técnica y 
el aprender de distancia que cubre todos los aspectos del curation -- 
cuidando para las colecciones arqueológicas tales como objetos, 
expedientes, informes, y datos digitales -- dondequiera que puedan ser
(en el campo, la oficina del arqueólogo, el laboratorio, o un 
depósito).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206859</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104558</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/managing-archeological-collections</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
